product_name: Adventure Medical Kits Blister Medic II
long_description: This compact kit contains everything you need to care for blisters on the trail. Includes a small 1.25 x 1 in. and large 3 x 1.75 in. GlacierGel(TM) pad to relieve pain and protect blisters from further irritation. Also includes 22 pre-cut Moleskin pads in assorted sizes to fit everything from your heels to toes. Six alcohol prep pads and six antiseptic towelettes are included for cleansing blisters prior to treatment.
short_description: This compact kit contains everything you need to care for blisters on the trail.
